caption:
Drop it like it’s hot... new offers have landed! 🎉 If you didn’t match today, don’t worry! More opportunities to claim will be released over the next few weeks, and we will email you if you’re likely to match 💙

To check for matches:
• Head over to the link in our bio and tap ‘Check for new samples’
• Don’t forget that you can now rely on our emails or texts to let you know when you’re most likely to match, so you don’t have to check your account daily!

New to Sampler? Tap the link in our bio to sign up and learn more about how you can receive free samples from your favorite brands 🤩

Waiting on an order? 📦 We are experiencing shipping delays on select offers, and are working to get you your samples ASAP. If you would like to check your order status, please visit the Orders tab on your Sampler Profile.

#trybeforeyoubuy #samplerio #samplerdrops #producttesting #testingproducts #productsamples #samplebox #freecoupons #tryforfree
